Class CommandDescription.DescriptionBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • containers.CommandDescription.DescriptionBuilder
  • Enclosing class:

    public static class CommandDescription.DescriptionBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    Internal builder class used to simplify the creation of the comments class.

    anton
